comment: Today blessed the official Bible for the new , which will be used to swear in all commanders of America's newest military branch . <URL>

(b / bless-01
      :ARG1 (b2 / book
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Bible")
            :mod (o / official)

                  :mod (m / military)
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / new-01))

                              :mod (a / all)
                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "America"))
                              :ARG1-of (n4 / new-01)))))
      :time (t / today))
